name: Arcade Rhythm - Jam 2021
description:
Note : 

This game was created by 2 students, while participating in the "Rhythm Jam 2021" for 7 days. It has 6 arcade terminals in a 3D universe, with which you can interact to launch the 6 musics and play on them. This game mixes 2D and 3D.

Musics : 

  • [8 bits] BTS - Idol by thedraleeshow
  • [8 bits] Muse - Psycho by Darnu-Pop
  • [8 bits] Sea Shanty -The Wellerman by 8-bit Universe 
  • [8 bits] xDeviruchi - Prepare the Battle
  • [8 bits] AdhesiveWombat - Overdrive
  • Infraction - ID

Credits : 

Johantran  : in charge of the code, integration, lightning, music Rhythm

Linkedin : https://www.linkedin.com/in/johan-tran-a39480206/ 

AllDee : in charge of the 3D modeling, texturing, lightning, music Rhythm

Artstation : https://www.artstation.com/alld
